header.name: Multiple Plugin Attributes
header.description: The description of your plugin goes here.

extension.caption: Material_Thickness
extension.description: Combines the part material and board thickness

extension.caption: Edge banding l1 with offset
extension.description: Certain edge banding machines always remove e.g. 1mm for the edge banding independent of the banding thickness. This attribute corrects the cut size for that relative offset in l1.

extension.caption: Edge banding l2 with offset
extension.description: Certain edge banding machines always remove e.g. 1mm for the edge banding independent of the banding thickness. This attribute corrects the cut size for that relative offset in l2

extension.caption: Edge banding width sel. front
extension.description: Automatically selects the proper edge banding width from the board size. Please fill out the list of available edge banding materials and widths.

extension.caption: Edge banding width sel. back
extension.description: Automatically selects the proper edge banding width from the board size. Please fill out the list of available edge banding materials and widths.

extension.caption: Edge banding width sel. left
extension.description: Automatically selects the proper edge banding width from the board size. Please fill out the list of available edge banding materials and widths.

extension.caption: Edge banding width sel. right
extension.description: Automatically selects the proper edge banding width from the board size. Please fill out the list of available edge banding materials and widths.
